com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.attachments.old

Interface CartAttachmentOwner


  • public interface CartAttachmentOwner
    Someone that manages one or more attachments

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bukkit.util.Vector getLastMovement()
      Temporary: gets the last relative movement update that was performed.
      com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.math.Matrix4x4 getTransform(boolean motion)
      Gets the absolute position transformation that is applied to children of this owner
      void onAttachmentsChanged()
      Called when one or more attachments have changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttachmentsChanged

        void onAttachmentsChanged()
        Called when one or more attachments have changed. This indicates these attachments need to be re-mounted.

      • getTransform

        com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.math.Matrix4x4 getTransform(boolean motion)
        Gets the absolute position transformation that is applied to children of this owner
        Parameters:
        motion - whether motion prediction must be performed (TODO: Remove this!)
        Returns:
        absolute position transformation matrix

      • getLastMovement

        org.bukkit.util.Vector getLastMovement()
        Temporary: gets the last relative movement update that was performed. Will be removed because it is a hack.
        Returns:
        last movement update
